actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to Presidential actions which should be taken pursuant to the Trade Act of 1974 to remedy the serious injury being caused to the domestic shoe industry by imports of nonrubber footwear.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should, and is hereby urged to, provide effective import relief to the domestic nonrubber footwear industry.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to Presidential actions which should be taken pursuant to the Trade Act of 1974 to remedy the serious injury being caused to the domestic shoe industry by imports of nonrubber footwear.
